actions.text: Reported by the Committee on Transportation. H. Rept. 107-431.
Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 152.
Mr. Boozman moved to suspend the rules and pass the bill.
Considered under suspension of the rules.
DEBATE - The House proceeded with forty minutes of debate on H.R. 4028.
On motion to suspend the rules and pass the bill Agreed to by voice vote.
Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

official_title: To designate the United States courthouse located at 600 West Capitol Avenue in Little Rock, Arkansas, as the "Richard S. Arnold United States Courthouse".

summary.text: Designates the U.S. courthouse located at 600 West Capitol Avenue in Little Rock, Arkansas, as the Richard S. Arnold United States Courthouse.

titles.title: To designate the United States courthouse located at 600 West Capitol Avenue in Little Rock, Arkansas, as the "Richard S. Arnold United States Courthouse".
